Column Comment.0: PROJECT IDENTIFIER: unique identifier for the project.
Column Comment.1: CONDITION OBSERVATION NUMBER: Unique number for the condition that mustbe met.
Column Comment.2: ACTIVE INDICATOR: A Y/N flag indicating whether this row of data is currently eitheractive / valid (Y) or inactive / invalid (N).
Column Comment.3: BUSINESS ASSOCIATE: Unique identifier for a business associate, such as aperson, company, regulatory agency, government or consortium.
Column Comment.4: PROJECT STEP CONDITION: condition(s) that must exist before the project stepcan be started. May be an external condition (a facility to be shut down) or anotherstep in the project that must be completed.
Column Comment.5: EFFECTIVE DATE: the date on which this row of data first came into effect from abusiness perspective.
Column Comment.6: END DATE: The date that the time interval for this record ends, such as the end of ashift on a particular day. May be tracked to clock time if desired.
Column Comment.7: EXPIRY DATE: the date on which this row of data is no longer in effect from abusiness perspective.
Column Comment.8: ROW_MANAGEMENT_GUID: This value may be used to provide a global uniqueidentifier for this row of data. Use of this column is not mandatory, but if used,optional PPDM NOT NULL and UNIQUE INDEX constraints provided in the datamodel DDL should be created.
Column Comment.9: PROJECT TYPE: the type of project, such as seismic, geological, exploitation etc.
Column Comment.10: REMARK: Narrative remarks relating to this row of data.
Column Comment.11: SOURCE: The individual, company, state, or government agency designated as thesource of information for this row.
Column Comment.12: START DATE: The date that the time interval for this record begins, such as the startof a shift on a particular day. May be tracked to clock time if desired.
Column Comment.13: ROW CHANGED BY: Application login id of the user who last changed the row.
Column Comment.14: ROW CHANGED DATE: System date of the last time the row was changed.
Column Comment.15: ROW CREATED BY: System user who created this row of data.
Column Comment.16: ROW CREATED DATE: Date that the row was created on.
Column Comment.17: ROW_EFFECTIVE_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of datais effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row of data wasmade available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.18: ROW_EXPIRY_DATE: A system assigned date that specified when a row of data isno longer effective from a systems perspective. This may be the date that a row ofdata was no longer available to end users, for example.
Column Comment.19: PPDM ROW QUALITY: A set of values indicating the quality of data in this row,usually with reference to the method or procedures used to load the data, althoughother types of quality reference are permitted.
